Values.1: Feared—anyone who knows about it avoids it
Values.2: Lost—considered a legend, or at least unfindable
Values.4: Treasure—a faction aims to steal it from another
Values.5: Contested—two factions both lay claim to it
Values.6: Coveted—1D6 factions are all trying to secure it

Values.11: A cult will stop at nothing to steal it (`/matrix faction cult`)
Values.12: Available at a high society auction
Values.13: Belonged to or was forged by a legend (`/matrix lore legend`)
Values.14: Carbon dating suggests it's older than Earth
Values.15: Changes the role of its bearer (`/role random`)
Values.22: Consigned to a WW2 Nazi vault
Values.24: Displayed on a criminal lieutenant's desk (`/matrix faction criminals`)
Values.25: Doomed a small New England town
Values.31: Fiercely guarded by an ancient king
Values.32: Flood's the bearer's mind with omens
Values.33: Forged by a monster (`/matrix enemy monster`)
Values.34: Grants its bearer a trait (`/trait random`)
Values.35: Hearsay has warped its image, reroll description
Values.36: Implies the existence of a precursor civilization
Values.41: Instills a compulsion to sculpt a certain form
Values.42: Integral to maintaining a coverup (`/matrix lore coverup`)
Values.43: Is the key to a strange sort of lock somewhere
Values.44: Its original owners are looking for it
Values.45: Kept in containment by an agency (`/matrix faction agency`)
Values.46: Magically responsible for a disaster (`/matrix lore disaster`)
Values.51: Most valuable object known to exist
Values.52: People tend to fall madly in love with it
Values.53: Protected by a small religious group
Values.54: Pushes you into a parallel dimension while held
Values.55: Secret race to claim it, reroll interest
Values.61: Shattered into shards and globally scattered
Values.63: Stolen and rotting in some museum
Values.64: To be offered at a diplomatic event (`/matrix lore diplomacy`)
Values.65: Transplanted to earth by an alien culture (`/matrix faction aliens`)
Values.66: When held aloft, it releases a powerful spell (`/matrix lore spell`)
